short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Uses ChatGPT to guess the exact location of the image on your screen. Displays exact coordinates on mini google maps emulator.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sick of losing to your friends in GeoGuesser? I sure was, and that's why I made this extension!

Allows users to get the precise coordinates of any location using ChatGPT's Vision. Can be used as a decisive advantage in games like GeoGuesser. 

How it works:
Users input their Open AI API Key, and each time the "Capture Screen" button is pressed, a screen shot of the users screen is sent to OpenAI, and the exact coordinates which ChatGPT determines the location to be at is returned and displayed on google maps.

How to use:
1) Download Extension
2) Create an OpenAI Api Key (https://platform.openai.com/api-keys)
3) Open the extension and click on the  "settings" modal
4) input your OpenAI Api Key, and click save.
5) Click "Capture Screen," and in a few seconds, a google maps marker to 
ChatGPT's predicted coordinates will appear!

Features:
1) Google Maps mini map: allows users to see the precise location of the predicted coordinates. Features "zoom in" and "zoom out" buttons.

2) "Show Map" and "Show Coordinates" buttons for functionality and speed. 

3) Dark Mode, for aesthetics.
